Based on the provided input, I could not find any specific information about the minimum lot size for the Planned Unit Development (PUD) district. The relevant section on PUD does not specify a minimum lot size. Instead, it states:

"There are no minimum lot sizes or setback requirements in this district however when the PUD comes for review, those items will be evaluated to make sure they conform to the standards set forth in this section of this Ordinance."

The PUD section does provide some other relevant information:

1. Minimum PUD size: 15 acres
2. Maximum overall density: 6 dwelling units per acre
3. Open space requirement: Minimum 15% of total PUD area

However, since there is no explicit minimum lot size stated for individual lots within a PUD, I cannot provide a definitive answer to the question about min_lot_size for PUD.
